short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control size of profile images in the Youtube comment section.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Set preferred profile image size for the Youtube comment section. 
- Hover zoom on profile images. 

It's time to appreciate the memes and put a face to the name.
